import React from "react"; import { Store } from "../../Store"; import "./sidebar.css"; export default function Sidebar() { const {state, dispatch} = useContex(Store); const {user} = state; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogOut = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); dispatch({ type: "USER_SIGNOUT" }); //remove user info from user storage localStorage.removeItem("user"); navigate('/') }; return (
